Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Kenton
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Pulaski, 63rd, and Cicero due to, construction near at 59th/Kenton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Pulaski, 63rd, and Cicero due to, construction near at 59th/Kenton.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Jackson/Karlov
ShortDescription: Westbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Kostner, Madison, Cicero, and Jackson due to, construction near Jackson/Karlov.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Kostner, Madison, Cicero, and Jackson due to, construction near Jackson/Karlov.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #84 Peterson Temporary Reroute at Peterson/Ravenswood
